DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : AUTOS
DOC.TEXT: U.S. Car Sales Soar in Japan : The sales increase has occurred as the Big Three auto_makers have introduced right-hand-drive vehicles and cut_prices , the companies said . Sales between January and May rose to 13 # 094 , up 106 % from the same period last year , according to industry data.Last year , 19 # 335 U.S.-made vehicles were sold in Japan , up 37.2 % over 1992 . U.S. auto_makers at a Japan Automobile Dealers Assn . seminar attributed the gains to models adapted for the Japanese market . Ford Motor Co . and Chrysler Corp . said their strategies are based on right-hand-drive cars and less expensive models they have introduced in Japan . General Motors Corp . said it plans to introduce right-hand-drive cars and is in talks to lower its prices .
